metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8099 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Incorrect returning of an error code in the index.c:read_entry() function leads to a double free in libgit2 before v0.26.2, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted repository index file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8099` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgit2-1.3 - 0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1
libgit2-fixtures - 0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: msalvatore> Downgrading to low: "As the index is never transferred via the network, exploitation requires an attacker to have access to the local repository."

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1').
